body_html:
@guschmue I changed precompiler check to #if _MSC_VER < 1910 and it expectedly works for VS2017 build tools.

Meanwhile, is it OK that inclusion of immintrin.h is implicit? It's only mentioned in intrinsics_port.h, but not included directly anywhere.
It seems inclusion of immintrin is passed by usage of external highwayhash. But these operations (_mm256_extract_epi32 and _mm256_insert_epi32) are used in core/kernels/sparse_matmul_op.h
